title: Remove Facebook from Follow Us and remove Email from Contact (including footer)

requirements.summary: Remove Email as a contact method from the Contact page UI (icon, label, and mailto link).
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page (frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx) no longer renders any Email section/card/row.
There is no mailto: link visible or present in the DOM on the Contact page.
No unused imports remain on the Contact page (e.g., Mail icon) after removal.

file_operations.description: Remove the Email contact block (icon, label, and mailto link) and delete related imports/usages (e.g., Mail icon, CONTACT_INFO.email, COPY.contact.email) so no mailto: remains on the Contact page.

requirements.summary: Remove Facebook from all Follow Us UI sections (Contact page and footer) while keeping Instagram unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page social section no longer renders the Facebook card/link (and does not import/render the Facebook icon).
The footer "Follow Us" section no longer renders a Facebook icon/link (and does not import the Facebook icon).
Instagram remains available and unchanged in both places.

file_operations.description: Remove the Facebook social link/card from the Contact page and delete the associated Facebook icon import; ensure the Instagram card remains unchanged.
Remove the Facebook icon/link from the footer Follow Us section and delete the associated Facebook icon import; ensure the Instagram icon/link remains unchanged.

requirements.summary: Remove Email from the footer contact area, keeping only the phone contact detail.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer (frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx) no longer renders a mailto: link or email address.
The footer still renders the phone tel: link using the configured phone number.
No unused CONTACT_INFO.email references remain after the footer change.

file_operations.description: Delete the footer email mailto link/address from the Contact section while keeping the phone tel: link intact; remove any now-unused CONTACT_INFO.email references.

requirements.summary: Perform minimal TypeScript/import cleanup to ensure the frontend builds and runs without errors after removing Email and Facebook UI elements.
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend builds without TypeScript or lint errors caused by removed imports/constants.
No runtime errors are introduced by the change (site loads and navigates to Contact page successfully).

file_operations.description: Verify the Contact page compiles cleanly after removals by ensuring there are no leftover unused imports/variables and no lingering mailto/facebook references.
Verify the footer compiles cleanly after removals by ensuring there are no leftover unused imports/variables and no lingering mailto/facebook references; confirm phone tel: link still renders.
